text: organizations are looking to move more
of their workloads to the cloud but with
so many it tools and services to choose
from they want to try before they buy
aws test drive allows just that
prospective customers are able to try
a private it sandbox environment before
join aws test drive and make sure your
solution is part of that decision today
test drive is an easy low-cost way to
make your solution stand out and shorten
sales cycles just go to aws.amazon.com
partners slash test drive to learn more
